answers.answer: Please have the cat checked for hyperthyroid, which would be the most common cause of weight loss with a good appetite.  Other possibilities are diabetes, and GI cancer.  No matter what I think the cat should be examined by a vet.I am so sorry about the owner!

question: the cat is pulling ot its fur and has lost much of his weight.  the owner is not much better, he is 78 on oxygen and suffers from a heart condition and lung diese.  the cats appetite is good but cant gain weight.  any ideas?
title: 16 y/o cat
